idea-plugin.name: EasyMap macOS
idea-plugin.description: A simple, logical and easy-to-remember keymap for IntelliJ on macOS. Good for IntelliJ beginners or those who have difficulty remembering the default IntelliJ key-bindings. Features are organized into groups. Each group has a memorable prefix key: ⌘T for tool windows, ⌘E for editing, ⌘G for Git, ⌘J for Java and ⌘D for debugging.
